Many of California’s Vietnamese families came here as refugees in the wake of the Vietnam War.

text:
We are speaking up. 

50 Members of our Caucus are sending a letter to the EPA today demanding they rescind the #DirtyPowerScam or at least extend the public comment period.

html: My heart goes out to all those affected by the fires throughout our state. I am profoundly grateful to all the first responders working to keep our friends and neighbors safe.

html: The President’s threat to hold the entire Federal Government’s funding hostage in exchange for his wasteful and unnecessary wall is outrageous. His demands for huge cuts to legal immigration are worse. These policies would harm & weaken our country.https://nyti.ms/2NUiIGu
